title: Airwheel X3 Self-Balancing Single Wheel Electric Scooter, A 170Wh Electric Unicycle
text: Airwheel X3 Self-Balancing Single Wheel Electric Scooter, A 170Wh Electric Unicycle Airwheel X3 is a small size and portable Self-Balancing Electric Unicycle with a 14-inch wheel size, and light weight. It features a Japan-Made Battery Core with 170Wh capacity which can supports 23km max range, and uses the Latest Intelligent System Chip and Gyroscope. It has good balance performance. USA, 16 September 2015 -- Airwheel, a customer-oriented company, is seeking to meet the need of different users by developing various series and models. The Airwheel dual-wheel Q series has an exquisite look and is easy to learn, especially designed for women. Airwheel A3, with the sitting-posture mode, is a perfect transport for city commuter who lives far away from their companies. Airwheel S5, another new product of 2015, is designed for cross-country lovers, which has no problem of going up and down stairs. However, people still feel lack of a portable and agile one to travel with. At this time, let’s take a look at the classic unicycle X series.Lighter, Space-saving and more portable Airwheel electric unicycle X3 wins by its weight—9.8 kilograms, which can be lifted by one hand and put in the special-designed backpack. Its one-wheeled design is rather space-saving and makes it possible to bring Airwheel X3 on the public transportation, such as bus or subway, which makes the travelling much more convenient. Powered by leading core technology and featured with portability, Airwheel X3 is the ideal commuting alternative. 130Wh battery and 170Wh motor Airwheel X3 is internally designed to be as space saving as possible for the large capacity battery. Mounted with Japan-made battery core, Airwheel X3 delivers sufficient battery range and efficient usage. Its 170Wh motor gives it the power to display all the outstanding functions and easily conquer the normal terrain. Latest Intelligent Chip The built-in intelligent chip improves the overall ability and functions of X3. It adopts the high-tech innovations, such as aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system to attain the self-balance, to provide a smooth trip and ensure the safety. Relatively Lower Price The price of Airwheel X3 is reasonable, comparing to other products of Airwheel. Therefore, it is a good choice for the first-time learners, especially women. Portable, powerful, and intelligent, Airwheel X3 is a perfect product for every scooter lover. Don’t hesitate any more and choose Airwheel intelligent scooter . # # #
